name: 弗里德里希·维勒
bio_short: 德国化学家，被誉为“有机化学之父”。他因在1828年“人工合成了尿素”（`wohler_urea_1828`）而闻名于世，沉重打击了“生命力”理论。他还首次分离出了纯铝（`wohler_aluminum_1827`）、铍（`wohler_beryllium_1828`）和钇（`wohler_yttrium_1828`）。
bio_short_en: A German chemist, known as a 'father of organic chemistry'. He is famous for the 'Wöhler synthesis' of urea in 1828 (`wohler_urea_1828`), which struck a major blow to 'Vitalism'. He also isolated pure aluminum (`wohler_aluminum_1827`), beryllium (`wohler_beryllium_1828`), and yttrium (`wohler_yttrium_1828`).
